sep_scene.content: In the image, actress Emma Watson is seen portraying her character, Hermione from the Harry Potter series. She is lying on the ground, her body twisted in a way that suggests she has been attacked by a group of witches. Her face is twisted, and her eyes are wide open, reflecting the intensity of the situation. The background is dark and filled with trees, adding to the overall somber atmosphere of the scene.

In the image, actress Emma Watson is seen portraying her character, Hermione from the Harry Potter series. She is in a dark forest, her face illuminated by the light of a nearby tree. Her hair, styled in a messy bun, is white and her eyes are wide open, reflecting a serious expression. The background is shrouded in darkness, with the silhouette of a tree and a figure in the distance.

In the image, actor James McAvoy, portraying the character of the young adult in the movie "X-Men: Apocalypse", is seen in a scene of destruction. He is standing in a pile of rubble and debris, with a large pile of rocks and rubble surrounding him. Dressed in a black and white sweater, he holds a piece of rubble in his hand, perhaps a memento or a symbol of the devastation. His face is etched with concern and sadness, reflecting the grim reality of the situation. The backdrop of the image is a dark, cave-like setting, adding to the overall somber mood of the scene.
